verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* dear \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* took \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w When|strong="H1980"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* sent \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w then|strong="H1980"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*; \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w made|strong="H7121"\w* offerings \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*, \w burning|strong="H6999"\w* perfumes \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* guiding Ephraim's footsteps; \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H0669"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* conscious \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* ready \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w well|strong="H3045"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w after|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* bands \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w love|strong="H0160"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w* \w who|strong="H0120"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* mouths, putting meat \w before|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Assyrian \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w would|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* go through \w his|strong="H0398"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w*, wasting \w his|strong="H0398"\w* children \w and|strong="H0398"\w* causing \w destruction|strong="H3615"\w* because \w of|strong="H0905"\w* \w their|strong="H0398"\w* evil designs.

\w My|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w given|strong="H7121"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* sinning \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*; though \w their|strong="H3808"\w* voice goes \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*, \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w lifting|strong="H7311"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w*.

\w How|strong="H0349"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, O \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*? \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* saviour, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* \w Admah|strong="H0126"\w*? \w how|strong="H0349"\w* \w may|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* do \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* did \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Zeboim? \w My|strong="H5414"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* soft \w with|strong="H5921"\w* pity.

\w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* effect \w the|strong="H3588"\w* heat \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*; \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* send \w destruction|strong="H7843"\w* \w on|strong="H0935"\w* \w Ephraim|strong="H0669"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w am|strong="H0595"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H0376"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*; \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H0935"\w* \w an|strong="H0935"\w* end \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* go \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w his|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*; \w his|strong="H3068"\w* cry \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1121"\w* loud, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2729"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*, shaking \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w fear|strong="H2729"\w*;

Shaking \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w fear|strong="H2729"\w* \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2729"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w like|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Assyria|strong="H0804"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w them|strong="H5921"\w* rest \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w says|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
The deceit of Ephraim and the false words of Israel are about me on every side. ...
